review: I am not having a love for this product.....seems to stall out much of the time,  However I live in a "slow to catch up" rural area state and my wifi is not the strongest or latest! But when it works.....,it works well!
author: DebM

review: had hard time getting it set up but it works as intended
author: Amazon Customer

review: Bought it for my parents but it never worked on their network. So eventually I brought it over to my house where it worked okay for one day . Now stuck in a boot loop. My old roku works fine still. This stick is junk. Too bad because I like the style.
author: KY

review: Another outstanding product at an outstanding price from AMAZON.  I recommend this for everyone who is looking to add streaming capabilities to their current TV.  I purchased 2 because it was such a good deal.
author: S. Cremona "Mike"

review: It was easy to install and allows us access to many options on our TV.
author: Maureen

review: Had a little trouble with the remote but chatted on line and got it resolved.
author: Elaine Cope

review: Fun while it lasted. It stopped working in less than four months. I will not replace it.
author: P. Glanville
